Services

Experts in importing legacy data

A Decade of Experience

Custom Developmen & Experts in Importing Legacy Data

Proware products have become adopted by many Ontario municipalities delivering more value than just permit workflows. As Proware products evolved adding; advance reporting capabilities, workflow integrity features and our experience customizing and integrating municipal databases continued to improve. The Proware team has developed a high level of expertise and experience in creating custom reports, converting and uploading legacy data to new systems.

How Can We Serve You

Custom Development

Need to customize or integrate municipal data?
Proware has a decade of experience in custom development and integrating legacy data formats with new software implementations.

Import Legacy Data

Are your files in many formats?
Proware can import and integrate custom legacy data in many different structures from; excel, SQL and many other legacy formats.
